text: Siuraq (Inuktitut syllabics: ᓯᐅᕋᖅSiuraq) formerly Tern IslandSiuraq (Formerly Tern Island) is an island located in Nunavut's Qikiqtaaluk Region in the northern Canadian Arctic. It is situated in the Foxe Basin. The mainland's Melville Peninsula is to the west, Baffin Island is to the northwest, and Kapuiviit is to the northeast. The closest Inuit community, Igloolik, is approximately to the west. ==References== Category:Islands of Foxe Basin Category:Islands of the Canadian Arctic Archipelago Category:Uninhabited islands of Qikiqtaaluk Region
title: Siuraq
